website_summaries.verdict: Sony took its time with the Tablet S, and it shows. The industrial design is smart, and the software refinements are both practical and restrained.
pros: The Sony Tablet S goes above and beyond the typical Android tablet experience by offering exclusive apps, ergonomic design, PlayStation certification for mobile gaming, DLNA video and music streaming, and an integrated IR universal remote control
cons: It's on the pricey side, the charging adapter is proprietary, and screen brightness isn't what it could be

customer_reviews.title: Big mistake because it's oh so slow
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling with this tablet since I bought it almost a year ago. It is painfully, agonizingly slow. Wait time between taps and response is an eternity. The surface is sensitive but, unfortunately, it's not very accurate in relation to touching a given item to open it. There are big problems with the image you view and touch actually connecting you with your target. For example in Hotmail it's incredibly difficult to select an email- something that should be simple. Slow processing time makes using this tablet almost pointless. I'll say this, though: The screen is beautiful and the slow processor is still fast enough for hour after fabulous hour of Angry Birds.
customer_reviews.author: iddanceaway

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say because it never charge so it never turn on. Was send it to repair but Sony said didn’t qualify for repairs so I have to do a return and I’m waiting for it to finalize.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Good Design, Poor Choices
customer_reviews.text: Sony makes some great products, and overall this is a great product, but its not without its flaws. Design and functionality are a plus, very responsive and easy to hold and carry. A plastic screen may be a turn off for some, but it makes it more hardy and is what allows for the looks of this unit. Pros: *Works Great *Feels Great *Looks Great Cons: *Unnecessary drain on power in standby; shut it off *Proprietary connector for power supply *Cannot be charged via USB
customer_reviews.author: Jacarda

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I've had the tablet for 2 months now. Actually bought it for my wife and she loves it. Speed is good. Price was competitive. Reason I dropped it to 4 starts is because the SDcard can ONLY be used to transfer files to and from the tablet. Meaning you can run apps from the SDcard to free up space on your device like you can on your smartphone. This wouldn't stop my from buying the tablet....I don't see us having 16GB in apps. I use the SDcard to store our Pictures and Music (it all still doesn't come close to 16GB since I mostly use Pandora for music).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Built In Battery wont charge at all light on side blinks all the time..
customer_reviews.text: Battery wont charge at all charging light just blinks red and when power is removed all settings are lost..
customer_reviews.author: Lowell Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for almost one month now. I really enjoyed it. The display is definetly different then any other tablet that gives a picture quality highly contrasted. Dark is more dark and visible-thanks to TruBlack technology. Its better then almost any tablet out there for book book reading experience. Remote app works excellent. few things I found not so good are battery with my kind of heavy use it last for about 5.5 hours. (I watch more videos on you tube including full length Free movies on YouTube) For now remote app works in landscape mode only. pucture quality is OK however i have same 5 M camera on my IiPhone which gives far better picture.
customer_reviews.author: Satnam Singh

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE!  This tablet is locked into an older OS that is not supported and makes apps unstable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a defunct tablet. Sony has locked the OS. You can't update it or even side load a different Os. It is locked into a piece of trash. The preloaded apps don't even work as they aren't supported by Sony either. Any new apps you try to download are unstable as they need new OS to work. This system shouldn't even be allowed to be sold.
customer_reviews.author: OneNuttyMama

customer_reviews.title: nice to work with as long it worked
customer_reviews.text: Not working after 14months. Sony wasn't helpful on repair. So mixed feelings, nice to work with as long it worked, but expected a longer lifetime. Had same bad experiences with two Sony mobile. Therefore I get away from my favorite brand for years. No Sony anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Wenzel N.

customer_reviews.title: a deceint usable tablet for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few days now. it is so much better than the DragonTouch R97, both in functionality and usability. The only down side I have observed is having such an old version of the Android OS. its size, weight and ergonomic design is great for my hands. Over all, it is a good purchase. I don't beleave in human perfection, thus 4 stars - and it is definately used
customer_reviews.author: FunkyC.

customer_reviews.title: Alot better than Acer A200
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet. I origanally got an Acer and after the first hour it quit working. Customer service at Acer was no help so I was nervous about purchasing another tablet. This was the best I could find for under $350. I was very happy and had only a little trouble with setting up google play but was able to figure it out. The unique wedge design fits easily in your hand. I would highly recommend this tablet to anyone looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet, a little expensive...
customer_reviews.text: I got the tablet, the protection sheet, stylus, USB convertor, Flip case and keyboard. It is a regular remote computer... I have it on my wireless at home where I don't have cellular reception, so the tablet is my "smart phone" at home. I can take GREAT pictures and panoramas and upload to Google, Facebook, or the home server. I thought about the cost, but figured that I would use it more than a laptop or another computer. Doesn't make coffee...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mark Rose

customer_reviews.title: very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to watch streaming video. Video freezes on MLB.com after ten seconds. Had two separate Sony tablets that Amazon graciously extended--- neither one worked on MLB. Bought ASUS transformer instead and it works flawlessly and is much faster processor as well. Sony is nice design, upgrades to ICS but failed most basic function and no one at Sony Support could figure it out after numerous attempts
customer_reviews.author: R. Neer

customer_reviews.title: awesome tablet
customer_reviews.text: I received this tablet as a gift after requesting an ipad. I have used the ipad, had one for 2 months and I am more satisfied with the sony tablet. I love the ir remote feature. Coming from an iphoneenvironment it was nice to be able to customize my screens as I wished. Transferring movies from my laptop to the tablet was simple with a memory card. The wedge design does make it easier to hold for several hours while reading and also while tyPing on my lap!
customer_reviews.author: carabina

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet
customer_reviews.text: My other tablet is an ASUS eee Pad and I love that one too. The Sony is different in that it has a curved edge and permits better grip and handling. In addition, I love the fact that I can use a regular SD card to expand the memory instead of using the microsd cards with the other tablets. I gave this to my daughter who has loved it and has had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Tablet to replace one I purchased from China on Dinodirect for $349. After seven months the battery went bad and I was told I had a six month warantee and the battery could not be replaced. Not only is this Tablet by far the best I've ever owned, but unlike items you buy on sites like Dinodirect, If you have a problem, you're dealing with a reputable company (Amazon.com) that will respond to problems. Thank you Sony for a great product and thank you Amazon.com for a great shopping experience. M. McCain
customer_reviews.author: Revmau

customer_reviews.title: An expensive remote control
customer_reviews.text: I picked up my tablet before I had a smart phone. It has a ton of great features. The screen size is impressive. I love the fact that it is a universal remote control. Recently that is all I use it for. No fault of its own. I have so many media devices this one is just not my primary. Battery life is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: atliia

customer_reviews.title: great tablet, but wish it had HDMI
customer_reviews.text: The hardware feels great- convenient, pretty, easier to hold compared to the flat/thin tablets. The screen has vibrant colors - it's a Sony after all. Usb host and SD card slot is really convenient for people with digital cameras and taking too many pictures. Now instead of carrying an external hdd and a laptop I am carrying the hdd and the tablet. 1 kg less ;-) Battery life could be better, but is ok - comparable to ipad. Biggest negative - no HDMI. Wish I did not oversaw this when I was buying. Overall good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: ukk

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Good Seller
customer_reviews.text: Great Product had everything as promised. Very happy with the product and also the seller. THe tablet it self is really good the update to 4.0.1 was good and straight forward :) Like the packaging of the product and the ergonomic design Timely product delivery :)
customer_reviews.author: Jay Mehta

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet.. Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Got this tablet about 2 months back. Upgraded to ICS about a week back. So far this tablet has proven to be a great tablet.. good battery life.. great screen...fast and snappy. Does everything I need it to do.. Netflix, kindle, and Skype. The original android version had problem with connecting to WiFi. It used to take for ever to connect back to my home network. But since upgrading it to ICS, all of that has gone away. So far this tablet has proven very goos value for the money (bwt I was an iPad owner originally. Gradually moving to the android ecosystem).. Liking what I see so far.
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh Jain

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet! Really great!
customer_reviews.text: This was my very first tablet and it is awsome! Sony did really good making this! Its easy to use and its really slim and light. It does everything from classic games that sony made to writing wors documents on it!
customer_reviews.author: Relle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these tablets, and i just can't complaint... fast browsing, social networks, movies, good quality pictures, etc. and the best of all is the remote control control app (you can control any home entertainment device with this tablet).
customer_reviews.author: Ramses

customer_reviews.title: Great display, Fast response
customer_reviews.text: Got my new tablet and so far I have no complaints, Very light and easy to hold thanks to the folded magazine design. Beautiful screen quality, Better than the Ipad because of the USB port, the SD card slot, accesse to PS3 games.
customer_reviews.author: Nezar

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product, not an Ipad
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but you must understand it is not an Ipad! I had issues with the software and Sony was very helpful in walking me through the steps to fix. Super fast and a good overall product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: best tablet  so far
customer_reviews.text: I have owened it for 6 weeks so far. It stays in the living room on the couch. I battle the wife for it dailey. It runs tv,roku, and dvd. It is comfortable. To hold and surf and play while wathing tv. Battety life is fine. I just throw it on thhe cradle for a few and it charges quick. I have played with the I pad and kindle fire and this blows them away hands down. I would highly recommend. It blows my netbook away. I can skype, text, amd make phone calls from it even though its only wifi. Hold it and u will fall in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: technowizz

customer_reviews.title: Good Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is very well designed and it is a shame that they didn't keep this one on their list of tablets. It has been redesigned and retitled experia, oh well. This tablet works very, very well.
customer_reviews.author: greg hall

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better cord
customer_reviews.text: First off, I love the tablet and I've got no complaints about the tablet...the only thing hurting the rating is the power cord. It's very loose where it connects to the tablet, and it stopped working entirely after 8 months. Since these things are $70 a pop it's very annoying to have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT PURCHASE I EVER MADE.
customer_reviews.text: Possitive: fast, works fine, good colors, internet conection works fine, remote control for almost all devices, easy and simple, perfect weight. Negative: no HDMI, the touchpad is a little slow.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo E.

customer_reviews.title: This Tablet is Pleasing
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several other tablets: Motorola (good encryption with very good display), iPad (best display and good security), Nook (good leisure fun), Impression (good display but limited apps); listed from best to good in their own right. Of course, that is just my opinion. My absolute favorite of them all is the Sony for its pro opearations, weight, size, ergonomic design, and all the saavy features. So far I've purchased another one as a gift. My Sony internet connectivity is very good so no complaint here. It has a beautiful screen, pro work features, and entertainment for all ages. I recommend the Sony tablet and plan to buy this tablet as a gift for other family members.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Android tablet out there
customer_reviews.text: I am typing this review on my Sony tablet s. One of the best tablets out there. I am glad I got this tablet instead of the iPad, since I already have the iPhone. I use this at home when watching tv and also when at work. Cant go wrong with Sony products.

customer_reviews.title: would recommend it if price is low, but would also look at other brands
customer_reviews.text: I use this tablet all the time. Is heavy by todays standards and wifi has tendency to lose connection and not reconnect . Will I buy this brand again......time will tell but after a year it is still performing like the day I got it.

customer_reviews.text: rebuilt and would not turn on. no problem getting credit back

customer_reviews.title: Best Tablet Ever

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet

customer_reviews.title: Very good tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 16GB version and it works all nice. Wonderful product. I have had problems with a stylus but I am not sure if that is a problem of the tablet.

customer_reviews.title: great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this tablet. The shape is great and unique. Moko case really makes it quite easy to type on. I highly recommend the sony tablet s.

customer_reviews.title: Sony S Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Sony has lived up to their High Quality Standard with this Tablet. I think it the perfect size with all the features needed. I would recommend this Sony S Tablet to anyone looking for the latest Android Technology with quality build.

customer_reviews.title: great product

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: i wanted just to rate it but i guess i have to write something about product to be able to rate it. overall very good product and deserves 5 stars .

customer_reviews.title: Best Android tablet
customer_reviews.text: Quiet impressed with the product. Nice style to hold for long time. Battery is good for more than a day. Only downside is, this doesn't support unicode font,but that's drawback of android OS. Anyhow satisfied with the product. Really worth for the money paid.
customer_reviews.author: sudhar

customer_reviews.title: Love Sony But...WiFi Conection Problems and A Littel Heavier Then Expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item due to my carpal tunnel and love of Sony products. (The shape of this tablet is designed to make for a more comfortable ergonomic fit.) However, I found that it was a little bit heavier then I expected. In addition, the WiFi was inconsistent and more aggravation then the price of the product was worth. Don't get me wrong, there are a ton of benefits and pluses to this tablet! I think that most would like or love it, but with my wrist being so sensitive and the WiFi concerns I had to return it and go with something smaller and lighter.
customer_reviews.author: MsDee

customer_reviews.title: Sony Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I did compared other tablets before buying the SonyS.....I was even debating between the IPad and Acer.....the screen resolution and the fact that it has a slot for memory card ...I'm really having alot of fun ...oh!...the camera takes awesome pictures....
customer_reviews.author: marika

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Must have for any fan of tech especially those fond of Sony products. If you feel like spending the money I would suggest the thirty two gig as this does not support expanded memory by sd card, it does have a port but its used to transfer data.
customer_reviews.author: Brittane'

customer_reviews.title: My Sony Tablet
customer_reviews.text: My tablet was not what I excepted. I thought it would be faster and slow to get the internet. Trying to download soft was another problem. Not really worth the money and time that I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Eliseo Sotelo

customer_reviews.title: awesome tablet could not of asked for more
customer_reviews.text: The was a very good tablet. It excedded my expectations and more the feel of the tablet is wonderful either in portrait or landscape mode it is great. The remote control app is a really nice feature that i didn't think i would use, but it defiantly has it uses. I would recomend this to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Device!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this device for a few days but it is everything that I thought it was and more. It has so many great features and is supported by Sony. I researched tablets for weeks until I made my decision and this is the only one that put everything together. IR remote, DNLA, hundreds of thousand of apps (most are free) and excellent graphics. This also has a excellent form factor. But best of all, it's not an Apple!!.
customer_reviews.author: JWM@NC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the Sony tablet it's an excellent product. Since getting this tablet I am barely using my laptop. Before deciding on Sony tablet considered iPad, Samsung Galaxy and few other tablets but this seemed like the best among them and no regrets so far.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet! It has everything I need, is really light weight, great image, and the touch screen works perfect. I was used to my husbands Ipad but I like this one best. Is much easier to share information with the computare, and it is much confortable to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: sony tablet
customer_reviews.text: I must say that in my opinion the sony s tablet is better than the ipad2.It has better features and having the option to use usb, and add memory card sets it apart from the ipad2. Cheaper and overall better buy......
customer_reviews.author: sterling

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't had any experience about tablets before sony s1, but for me this tablet gave me good Impression. Disadvantage for this tablet is some times when I surfing in internet the programe close alone I think some guys call this situation (crash) or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: ADE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tablet
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this tablet. It is lightning quick, responsive, and easily customizable. As of yesterday there is root access which is also an added bonus. I have been using this for the past few days and it has been a great experience. Battery life is pretty good as I have been doing some heavy internet usage, watching videos, playing games, and reading comic books. I have full brightness on. I would recommend getting the cradle as it is extremely convenient for charging and gives the tablet a nice look as a dynamic desk clock or picture frame.
customer_reviews.author: jamminjon82

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet!!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the tablet more each day as I learn more about what all it can do! I wish it had come with a printed instructions booklet.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Carroll

customer_reviews.title: lightweight
customer_reviews.text: the 1 that i wanted to order is motorola xoom, but decided to orthe sony instead. after a week, i wanted to return this and order the motorola. but when i went to the local store to see it. the motorol ais much heavier and i decided to keep it. graphic is good. connection to wifi is fast. and best of all its very light weight. eventhough motorola has more function but i dont think i will want to hold my tablet taking pic. so i love mine, sony.
customer_reviews.author: mochi

customer_reviews.title: The Sony Tablet S 16g  "I want more." in the Apps area.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this with the idea of functionality between the new tablet and my SP3. I am waiting for an extra cable so that I can get my game device and the tablet to work in unison. The graphics are sensational. I look every time I get a chance for additional applications. I just down loaded an AutoDesk application. I spent my educational career teaching CAD software. Keep the new apps coming forward. The Sony Tablet S is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A.

customer_reviews.title: sony tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with androids, apps and a tablet. I am learning how to use it. I have alot to learn. It may be faster and smarter than I am. I am used to my laptop. I have had laptops for about 10 years. There is quite a bit of difference.
customer_reviews.author: crispi

customer_reviews.title: Sony Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fast delivery and works very well. The price is well worth the product. Light weight and battery life is at least 8 hours strong.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R Siles

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product, I bought for my wife on her birth day and she loved it!. This is all she needed ...
customer_reviews.author: Juan M. Gamez

customer_reviews.title: Sony Tablet S
customer_reviews.text: Fast performance in all the software, but the tablet its self is made of cheap plastic. I would still recommend, but be careful throwing it around. Scratches are easily obtained
customer_reviews.author: PBram

customer_reviews.title: Love my tablet
customer_reviews.text: My tablet is wonderful. I can use it for work and for fun. The camera is wonderful and takes great pictures. I am so glad I bought it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dacia

customer_reviews.title: Nice device
customer_reviews.text: I choose this device because i have a network system based in DLNA so its easier to handle with some apps running in my tablet. Besides it's too useful at my office to work.
customer_reviews.author: MOISES DAVID LOPEZ JARAMILLO

customer_reviews.title: I did not like the cord that charges the product.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the tablet but the cord to recharge the tablet was very loose and did not fit in the tablet very well.
customer_reviews.author: maree kerr

customer_reviews.title: awesome sony but not the play station
customer_reviews.text: Tne tablet is much more than samsung and iPad. Its stylish, light and solid. More than market icon ipad and samsung. The picture quality is crisp and thed processor is fast. The thing which is disgusting is the promise made by sony about the playstation is rubbish and pathetic. At least sony do not project the advertisement for playstation platform first time in its android tablet. The graphics are week and the games are too old. However, sony thumbs up for brilliant tablet

customer_reviews.title: Fast,easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Light,probably just as good if not better than the ipa,very good camera,fast,fun,easy to use,exactly what i was expecting,except for the stupid power connector,would buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Cool Sony S1
customer_reviews.text: Compared to IPAD this is very cool and universal remote is a great app. I was really impressed with this tab.
customer_reviews.author: Satty Ganeswara Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect couch device
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet that sits comfortably in your hand. Best part is the Sony S tablet is also a universal remote, which was easy to setup and it is easy to use. If you are thinking about purchasing a universal remote and a tablet, then you should highly consider the Sony S tablet.
customer_reviews.author: JStar

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not put it down since I have received it. No more searcching for remote controls either, in my house THAT IS LESS STRESS. The only problem I have with it is the connectivity (internet) is a little weak when not at home. Apart from that it is a GREAT buy. I also have an Ipad and a Kindle Fire. I prefer my Sony SGPT to them both.

After using it a few months it has the same issues I had with the I pad. On top of that the android lags horribly and typing is extremelt delayed. I would stick with your pc unless you have to have a tablet then I would buy an ipad. I think I going back to pc's.

customer_reviews.text: I really like if I had to do it all over again I probably wouldn't get a tablet because to me its just a oversized smart phone. However its fun, sleek, and convenient. The technology on it is cool and different from other tablets. I haven't used everything on it yet but I have enjoyed using it so far.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, easy to use with the clear screen. New model and fast internet and complete menu.

customer_reviews.title: sony tablet
customer_reviews.text: Mine seemes to have a few bugs but I bought it used. But I can deal with the bugs. Overall I'm happy with it.

customer_reviews.text: i knew buying an android device from sony was a bad choice as they rarely push out firmware updates. now this device is good as a door stop
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: Just not that good

It's slow, sluggish, has a hard time recognizing the same wifi everyday when it never even left my home. theres better tablets out there so I suggest to anyone to find something else.

customer_reviews.text: This works so nicely. Compared to Galaxy I used before, It respond more quickly. It's as good as I pad 2, but the design is better than I pad 2. It suits to my room. It makes my room outstanding standing with it's cradle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this item its fine but i didnt get all the details about the condition
customer_reviews.text: i rate this 2 stars because it has a big scratch on the screen, i know the item was used condition, but i dont remember the seller specifying this, just minor use, and stuff like that, i've been testing this tablet and everything its working fine but next time i would like more details about the product thats why i rate this 2 stars, when actually i was thinking 1 star!! better details to the other new costumers please
customer_reviews.author: MilanEtiko

customer_reviews.title: Tablet to meet the promised
customer_reviews.text: The actual tablet is not the same that I had before.......besides not dowload games it is slow and Goggle maps is inacurate.....Un til Amazon or anybody else do not solve the problem of the games my mine will find more and more msitakes in the tablet.....I sugest do aloud this...Sony is a good brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but whats with wifi signal?
customer_reviews.text: The tablet has now ICS but the wifi signal issues continue. Also has probles with Live Wallpapers, after a while the tablet starts to fail and has to be restarted. For everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rms

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. My wife loves it. It is perfect for her needs. She couldn't be happier if were an ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Van Buren

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I chose the Sony tablet because of the confidence I have in Sony. I currently have SONY cameras' dvd recorder, home theater system, ps3 etc so i chose the tablet based on the good Sony name. The tablet keeps dropping off of my wireless network when all other devices including my Samsung Galaxy note performs flawlessly. The display also keeps going dark... not enter sleep mode... it just goes dark. My Galaxy note totally out performs this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. Just dont upgrade to ICS.
customer_reviews.text: Out of warranty and after while, the screen acts like its possessed. Also, once you upgrade to ICS, no more SD card use.
customer_reviews.author: everything under the sun

customer_reviews.title: Great and Uniqe
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works great and makes ipad owners asking me to try it....love it! works great with my xperia arc phone: 3g internet, phone calls, text messages etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: o.k.  but not great
customer_reviews.text: The main drawback is screen sensitivity. Typing very difficult and scrolling too. Wife's IPAD appears much better in this respect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Irresponsible seller
customer_reviews.text: Seller did not clean it up before sending it. I contained pictures not appropriate for children and I bought it as a gift for my nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than most!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Really fun tablet. I like the multi app ability. The quality of the frontal camera is too low though.
customer_reviews.author: Alan F

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I really love this tablet! It's fast and the only down side is the battery life is a little short.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Souza

customer_reviews.title: for standard user not the league of the high end ones
customer_reviews.text: I bought it after 5 days of playing with I returned it because it doesn't work smooth enough I think it is too slow, the screen was not sensitive i use my tablet for graphics and sketches and the screen doesn't work well with the Capacitive Touch Stylus as it works with my Galaxy S2 phone I think if you are going to invest so much money in high end tablet do the extra mile and get the stronger ones that cost a little bit more. for standard user it is great, very comfortable size beautiful colors and great Sony's add-on apps
customer_reviews.author: bytomer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was very good but I send it in my country .

customer_reviews.title: sony tablet s
customer_reviews.text: this is a espectacular tablet. good dimension, very confortably, fast, super.! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! !

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet, it has a great comfortable feel to it. It's fast and does whatever I need it to do. Very happy with this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: S.M

customer_reviews.title: used but looks brand new
customer_reviews.text: I received this item expecting it to be used but when i opened it was perfect and it works great, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Diego Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: He Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new Sony S tablet and uses it everyday. The screen size is great at roughly 9.4". Great product!

customer_reviews.title: can't uterlise services
customer_reviews.text: International user its not worth it , some apps and all music need to be in the USA for that to work ....

customer_reviews.title: Tablet S Sony
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good product, it's faster, lighter and functional than others. The throw function is one of my favorites.

product_meta.title: Sony SGPT111US/S Wi-Fi Tablet (16GB)
product_meta.description:
Size:16 GBAll our innovations folded into one. All the great things you know from Sony, now in a tablet. With a comfortable design that fits easily in your hand, and a vibrant trublack display, enjoy a truly optimized tablet that's responsive and intuitive. Access playstation games, reader ebooks, music and new release movies through Sony Entertainment network or control your living room via the built-in universal IR remote control. Manufacturer:Sony Corporation: Manufacturer Part Number:SGPT111US/S. Warranty:standard warranty:1 year limited. Storage:flash memory capacity:16GB
